Name: Yash Bhangale

Focus: Building scalable, resilient infrastructure and automated CI/CD pipelines
Expertise: Cloud & DevOps Engineer | Kubernetes Enthusiast | Linux Power User
Achievements: Multiple Hackathons Winner | 1 Year of Industry Experience

I'm a passionate DevOps Engineer and Linux enthusiast with expertise in containerization, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud infrastructure. My journey in tech started with a fascination for automation and has evolved into a commitment to building scalable and resilient systems.

When I'm not optimizing infrastructure or automating deployments, you can find me participating in hackathons, contributing to open-source projects, or experimenting with the latest DevOps tools and technologies.
